metadata.title: USN-6157-1 -- GlusterFS vulnerability
metadata.description: Tao Lyu discovered that GlusterFS did not properly handle certain event notifications. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6157-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  glusterfs-client - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1 libgfxdr0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1 glusterfs-common - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1 libgfrpc0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1 libgfapi0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1 libglusterfs-dev - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1 libglusterd0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1 libglusterfs0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1 libgfchangelog0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1 glusterfs-server - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1 glusterfs-cli - 10.1-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
